author: Suzy Walker-Toye
comment: Love the idea. The colour is now fixed but is still grey in dim mode? Is that by design, I'd like it to be the colour all the time, or an option to choose the dim mode colour because grey is v dull. Also,  the hour hand grows grey before changing colour which looks odd. Then I think it would be 5 stars. Thx. Re reply,  perhaps an option and grey by default would still fit spec? Is that possible?

reply.author: Tamás Birkás
reply.content: It is designed to be always grey because the official Android Wear design specifications says that the ambient mode has to be grayscale. I think it would be nicer with colors too, but I want to fit to the specifications.

reply.author: Tamás Birkás
reply.content: This is simple watch face for Android Wear devices and it doesn't have a phone instance. You can select it in the official Android Wear app or when you install then it automatically becomes visible on your wear device. You can uninstall it through the Play Store or in the phone Settings -> Apps menu.
